newsitem.title: UK: Russia prices $1.0 billion five-year Eurobond.
newsitem.headline: Russia prices $1.0 billion five-year Eurobond.

text.p: Russia's $1.0 five-year Eurobond has been priced, joint lead managers J.P. Morgan and SBC Warburg said on Thursday.
MINISTRY OF FINANCE ACTING ON BEHALF OF THE RUSSIAN FEDERATION
TYPE STRAIGHT ISS PRICE 99.561 PAY DATE 27.NOV.96
MOODY BA2 LISTING LUX TAX PROVS GROSS UP
S&P BB- DENOMS (K) 10+1 SALE LIMS US/UK/RU/FR
IBCA BB+ NEG PLG YES CRS DEFLT YES
MGT/UND 0.625 SELL CONC 0.375 PAY FREQ SEMI-ANN
UNDERLYING GOVT BOND 5.875 PCT U.S. TREASURY NOTE DUE 30.NOV.01
NOTES CO-LEADS: CHASE INVESTMENT BANK, CS FIRST BOSTON,
DAIWA, DEUTSCHE MORGAN GRENFELL, MERRILL LYNCH
CO-MANAGERS: ABN AMRO HOARE GOVETT, ALFA BANK, ANZ,
HSBC, ICFC, LEHMAN BROTHERS, NOMURA AND UNICOMBANK
